article: president clinton thursday ordered officials to begin preparing to shut down parts of the government next tuesday as a defiant congress worked late into the night to finish work on two short-term bills to keep the government running that clinton has vowed to veto .
abstract: house senate work on budget legislation president vows to veto
candidates: congress worked late into the night to finish work on two short-term bills to keep the government running that clinton has vowed to veto.
